mods.abstract: Excerpt from the 1953-11-21 WSM (Nashville, TN) broadcast of Ernest Tubb's Midnite Jamboree, featuring an interview with Carrie Rodgers, who mentions the celebration of the 28th anniversary of the Grand Ole Opry.

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
